description: This file defines the SearchFragment class, a UI component for search functionality in an Android music player app. It provides a static factory method for instantiation and overrides the onCreateView method to inflate the corresponding layout.

classes.name: SearchFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays a placeholder search UI for browsing/searching music.

methods.name: newInstance
methods.description: Creates and returns a new instance of SearchFragment.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout using the provided LayoutInflater.
